Question
========

Answerlist
----------
* 5.234
* 2.288
* 0.981
* 0.962


Solution
========


Answerlist

* Dit antwoord is incorrect.
* Dit antwoord is incorrect.
* Dit antwoord is correct.
* Dit antwoord is incorrect.
